text: Ivane "Vano" Merabishvili (; born 15 April 1968) is a Georgian politician.International Crisis Group (ICG) (19 December 2007), Georgia: Sliding towards Authoritarianism? Europe Report NÂ°189 , p. 23. fn. 281 He became Prime Minister of Georgia on 4 July 2012. His term ended after his resignation on 25 October 2012. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Prime Ministers of Georgia
title: Vano Merabishvili
